title: #HwLldpService.v1_0_0.HwLldpService

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

LldpEnabled.description: This property indicates whether the LLDP function is enabled.
LldpEnabled.longDescription: The value is of a Boolean type which indicates whether the LLDP function is enabled.

WorkMode.description: This property indicates the LLDP working mode.
WorkMode.longDescription: The value is a character string that indicates the LLDP working mode.

TxDelaySeconds.description: This property indicates the transmission delay (in seconds) of the LLDP packets.
TxDelaySeconds.longDescription: The value is a number that indicates the transmission delay (in seconds) of the LLDP packets.

TxIntervalSeconds.description: This property indicates the interval for sending LLDP packets.
TxIntervalSeconds.longDescription: The value is a number that indicates the interval for sending LLDP packets.

TxHold.description: This property indicates the multiplier of the time that LLDP packets are held on neighboring nodes.
TxHold.longDescription: The value is a number that indicates the multiplier of the time that LLDP packets are held on neighboring nodes.

HwLldpService.description: This is the LLDP service information.
HwLldpService.longDescription: LLDP service information, including the enablement status and domain controller information.
